entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who drew level with Neville and was present when Harry showed off his Firebolt.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as the one who lost the passwords and was trying to remember them.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the owner of the Firebolt and is being admired by his peers.

entities.name: sir cadogan
entities.description: Sir Cadogan is mentioned as the one who was letting Harry into the common room.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the only person who didn't rush over to admire Harry's Firebolt.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is mentioned as a new broomstick that Harry has acquired.

entities.name: cleansweep sevens
entities.description: Cleansweep Sevens are mentioned as the type of broomsticks used by Ravenclaw students.

relationships.description: Harry is described as the owner of the Firebolt, which he showed off to his peers.
Neville lost the passwords and was trying to remember them.
Ron is mentioned as being present with Harry when he showed off his Firebolt.
Sir Cadogan was letting Harry into the common room.
